<Text: Latrodectus geometricus, commonly known as the brown widow, brown button spider, grey widow, brown black widow, house button spider or geometric button spider, is one of the widow spiders in the genus "Latrodectus".
Triplets:<Latrodectus geometricus

<Text: Latrodectus geometricus:  As such, it is a 'cousin' to the more infamous "Latrodectus mactans" (black widow).>
